featuresSection.heading: Explore Diverse Residential Options and Floor Plans When You Rent House in Sector 63 Gurgaon
description: Sector 63 offers a versatile housing market ranging from compact builder floors perfect for singles or young couples to expansive independent bungalows ideal for large families. Understanding the configuration options available is the first step toward finding the perfect rent house in Sector 63. Our inventory includes properties that boast contemporary architecture modern fittings and access to green spaces ensuring a high standard of living for all tenants.

Whether your priority is location size or specific amenities like private gardens or ample parking space we have the right rental solution. Review the common types of residential houses available for rent in this prime Gurgaon location below. Each category caters to a distinct lifestyle demand providing flexibility and choice to prospective tenants moving into Sector 63 Gurgaon.

features.title: 1 BHK Builder Floor
features.description: Ideal for young professionals or students this configuration offers privacy and affordability. 1 BHK units in Sector 63 are typically found in well-maintained builder floor societies providing security and essential services without the high maintenance costs associated with larger societies. They are efficient well-lit and often situated close to key commercial centers making the morning commute extremely short.

features.title: 2 BHK Independent House
features.description: A perfect choice for small families or working couples desiring more space than an apartment allows. These independent houses offer the luxury of a private entrance and often include dedicated parking and utility areas. Renting a 2 BHK independent house in Sector 63 provides greater flexibility for personalized decor and a quiet living environment away from crowded high-rise buildings.

features.title: 3 BHK Luxury Villa
features.description: For those seeking opulence and maximum space a 3 BHK luxury villa is the pinnacle of rental living in Sector 63 Gurgaon. These properties usually feature double-height ceilings expansive living areas servant quarters and sometimes even private terraces or small gardens. These rentals are situated in premium pockets of the sector offering exclusivity and top-tier neighborhood safety.

features.title: 4 BHK Residential Bungalow
features.description: Designed for large joint families or high-net-worth individuals needing extensive accommodation. A 4 BHK bungalow offers multiple floors attached bathrooms and vast storage space ensuring comfort for everyone. When you rent house in Sector 63 of this size you invest in a prestigious address and unparalleled residential peace with easy access to schools and hospitals.

features.title: Studio Apartments
features.description: A streamlined modern living solution for singles who prioritize efficiency and location over size. Studio apartments in Sector 63 Gurgaon are compact smartly designed and fully equipped often located near commercial clusters. They offer excellent value proposition combining low maintenance with high accessibility to dining and entertainment options within the sector.

features.title: Duplex Homes
features.description: Offering multi-level living a duplex home provides separation between common living areas and private bedrooms appealing to families who enjoy structured interior space. Renting a duplex in Sector 63 gives the feeling of living in a large house while often being part of a well-secured complex. This configuration adds a touch of architectural elegance to your rental home experience.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About How to Rent House in Sector 63 Gurgaon
faqSection.description: Get detailed answers to common inquiries regarding rental terms property types and local market conditions in Sector 63.

faqs.question: What is the typical lease duration when I rent house in Sector 63 Gurgaon
faqs.answer: The standard lease agreement duration in Sector 63 is usually 11 months renewable upon mutual agreement between the tenant and the landlord. However for corporate leases or high-value independent villas longer terms such as 18 or 24 months can often be negotiated. It is important to clarify the lock-in period which is generally six months during which neither party can terminate the agreement without penalty. We recommend discussing your specific needs with our rental specialists to draft a customized lease that suits your stay duration.

faqs.question: What are the common security deposit requirements in Sector 63 rentals
faqs.answer: Security deposits for residential properties in Sector 63 generally range from two to three months' worth of rent. For premium independent houses or fully furnished luxury villas landlords might request up to four months' rent as security. This deposit is refundable at the end of the tenancy subject to a satisfactory property inspection and clearance of all utility bills. Ensure the deposit amount and refund terms are clearly documented in the rental agreement to avoid any future disputes.

faqs.question: Are independent houses more expensive to rent than apartments in Sector 63
faqs.answer: Yes independent houses and builder floors typically command a higher rental price compared to equivalent BHK configurations within multi-story society apartments in Sector 63. This difference is due to the inherent benefits of independent living such as private entrance greater square footage dedicated parking and no shared common area maintenance charges with a larger society. However the cost also depends heavily on the specific amenities furnishing level and the age of the construction.

faqs.question: What factors influence the monthly rent of a house in Sector 63 Gurgaon
faqs.answer: Several factors determine the monthly rent including the property size BHK configuration whether it is furnished semi-furnished or unfurnished and its exact location within the sector. Properties closer to the Golf Course Extension Road or those offering exceptional connectivity tend to have higher rents. Additionally the quality of interior fittings access to backup power and the inclusion of white goods or high-end security systems significantly impact the final rental price.

faqs.question: Is brokerage charged to tenants looking to rent a house in Sector 63
faqs.answer: Yes in the Gurgaon rental market including Sector 63 a standard brokerage fee is typically charged to the tenant. This fee is usually equivalent to one month's rent for a standard 11-month lease agreement. This charge covers professional services provided by the real estate agent including property identification site visits negotiation and detailed documentation of the lease. We ensure our brokerage structure is competitive and transparent from the outset.

faqs.question: What utilities are usually included in the rent in Sector 63
faqs.answer: Generally utilities such as electricity water and gas charges are not included in the quoted monthly rent and must be paid separately by the tenant based on consumption. Maintenance charges for common areas if applicable for builder floors are usually included in the rent or paid by the landlord. Tenants should clarify who is responsible for paying society charges cable internet and any major repair costs before signing the lease document.

faqs.question: Can I rent a house in Sector 63 if I have pets
faqs.answer: Pet policies vary significantly among landlords and housing societies in Sector 63. While many independent house owners are more lenient about pets especially small ones some landlords strictly prohibit them to prevent potential damage to the property. It is absolutely crucial to disclose the presence of pets upfront. If permission is granted the landlord may request a slightly higher security deposit to cover any potential damage caused by the animals.

faqs.question: How quickly can I move into a rented house in Sector 63 after finalizing the deal
faqs.answer: The move-in timeline largely depends on the current occupancy and the complexity of the lease formalities. If the house is vacant and the tenant provides all necessary documentation promptly the process can be completed within 3 to 7 working days once the lease is signed and the deposit is transferred. Our team works efficiently to expedite background checks and document verification ensuring a smooth and quick transition to your new home.

faqs.question: What documentation is required from the tenant to finalize the rental agreement
faqs.answer: Prospective tenants are typically required to provide valid photo identification such as an Aadhar Card or Passport proof of current address employment verification or business details and bank statements for financial verification. Foreign nationals must provide passport visa and proof of residence permits. All documentation is necessary for police verification which is mandatory for all rental agreements in Gurgaon.

faqs.question: Is Sector 63 well-connected by public transport options
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 63 enjoys excellent public transport access. While it is optimally linked by road the rapid metro station nearby provides quick access to Cyber City and other business districts. Additionally app-based taxi services shared auto-rickshaws and local bus routes ensure that residents can navigate Gurgaon easily and efficiently even without owning a private vehicle.
